text:
President Biden is doing the unthinkable by easing energy restrictions on Venezuela to compensate for America’s energy needs instead of looking toward America’s own energy sector.
 
Full statement here ⬇️ https://t.co/UkIxczXZi2

Efforts to support women with maternal mental health issues lack coordinated action from the federal government and as a result, 50% of new moms never receive treatment. In @HouseCommerce, we discussed my TRIUMPH for New Moms Act to support maternal health in America. https://t.co/pDz3TnyO0K

It is critical that we find a path forward in the House to pass the VALID act. By modernizing the way @US_FDA reviews and approves diagnostic tests, we can ensure that Americans have access to safe and accurate tests that promotes public safety and spurs innovation. https://t.co/7VVml0QXsh

.@GOPHELP included the VALID Act in their FDA user fee reauthorization package. @RepDianaDeGette and I have been working with our colleagues in the Senate for over five years to advance diagnostic testing reform to modernize our nation's healthcare system. https://t.co/dZdAQBrCwQ

The nationwide baby formula shortage is alarming and requires immediate action. #ICYMI: I joined more than 100 of my colleagues to call on the Biden administration to address this shortage and ensure baby formula is available to families across the country.https://t.co/VIKrcK4kNs
Now is the time to #FlipTheSwitch and unleash American Energy. Washington Democrats’ anti-American energy policies have been hurting our country and families for far too long. https://t.co/lEZBXqk3Tc

The skyrocketing cost of living is crushing hard-working Hoosiers families and businesses. As one Hoosier put it, "Everything keeps going up and up and up, and every time something goes up, and anytime something goes up, employees' wages aren't going up." https://t.co/iBVqsxsdk7

The White House made a blatantly false statement on Twitter about vaccine availability at the end of the Trump Admin. This needs to be labeled as false. President Biden and 3 million Americans had received two doses of the Pfizer vaccine prior to his inauguration. 18 M one dose.

It is devastating that the number of overdoses continues skyrocket. Congress must enact legislation like the HALT Fentanyl Act, and hold both China and the cartels to account for their role in spreading these deadly drugs throughout the US. https://t.co/mDGoW5oNFl

Three MSD Mount Vernon Schools are now STEM certified. I am thrilled to see students in the Mount Vernon Community gain valuable experience  with science, technology, engineering, and mathematics. Keep up the good work! https://t.co/OQOhtjCQRk

Today, I met with my fellow conferees to find a compromise between the Senate’s USICA legislation and the House’s America COMPETES Act. It is critical that we work together to help negotiate a bill that ensures we remain the world’s leader in innovation. https://t.co/ANX9SH8nde https://t.co/87WhKljJsD

The April report is out and the cost of living is continuing to rise, showing prices are up 8.3% over where they stood a year ago. This rise in the cost of living continues to exceed projections and is hurting the purchasing power of hard-working Hoosiers. https://t.co/fRj6TPoghZ
